message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with the task of generating natural language descriptions from images, which is a problem in computer vision (CV) and natural language processing (NLP). Therefore, cs.CV and cs.CL are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also evaluates the existing metrics for image captioning, which involves machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) techniques. Hence, cs.LG and cs.AI are also likely sub-categories. Finally, the paper explores the use of Word Mover's Distance (WMD) document metric, which is a measure of semantic similarity and falls under information retrieval (IR). Therefore, cs.IR is also a likely sub-category.
